paragraph: Filip "Heinrich" Hałucha (born 14 October 1980) is a Polish metal musician. He is the current bassist for Vesania and Masachist, and is a former bassist for Decapitated, Rootwater, and UnSun.
== Gear ==

Ampeg B4R amp
Sansamp Bass Driver
EBS Multidrive
B.C. Rich Bernardo 5
Ampeg SVT6Pro
Ampeg SVT810E classic
Sansamp RBI, MXR M80
BBE sonic maximizer 362
